item.description: Best Friends is hosting an all dog meet-up group for pet guest socialization. It is free to participate! We have an indoor and out door playroom where dogs can exercise and interact with each other. They can be off leash to run and romp. We provide toys, water, and clean up. All friendly dogs are welcome to come play. Please just be sure your pet is up to date on vaccines since they will be interacting with other dogs. Refreshments available for both pet and human friends alike. Don't be shy! Come and meet some new friends!!
item.how_to_find_us: 1511 Silas Deane Highway, Rocky Hill, CT 06067

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Making New Friends in February
